title: Beyond the Code: How Klever Boy AI Is Humanizing Artificial Intelligence for Business
description: Artificial intelligence can often feel distant or impersonal, but Klever Boy AI takes a different path: one that keeps people at the center of technology. title: Meta unveils smart glasses with apps and artificial intelligence assistant
description: MENLO PARK — Four years ago, when Meta released smart glasses that could take photos and videos, the product became a surprise hit. Since then, millions have snapped them up.
content:
MENLO PARK — Four years ago, when Meta released smart glasses that could take photos and videos, the product became a surprise hit. Since then, millions have snapped them up.
Now the company is raising its bets on eyewear.

title: L&T Tech expands global AI collaborations, partners with MIT Media Lab
description: L&T Technology Services (LTTS) has partnered with MIT Media Lab to advance next-generation artificial intelligence and sustainable engineering solutions. The collaboration will focus on Agentic AI, AGI applications, mobility innovation, and greener infrastructure.
content: L&T Technology Services has partnered with MIT Media Lab to explore next-generation advancements in artificial intelligence. In an exchange filing, L&T Technology said on Friday that as part of the agreement, the company will exchange information wit... [1715 chars]

title: AI in Tech Recruitment: How Automation is Streamlining Hiring without Sacrificing Human Judgment
description: Recruitment in the technology sector has always been fast-paced, competitive, and high-stakes. Companies are under constant pressure to acquire top-tier talent, while individuals want opportunities that correspond with their talents, aspirations, and beliefs.  The rise of artificial intelligence (AI) has recently changed the hiring process in a big way. title: General Chauhan Advocates for Modern Defence Enhancements
description: General Anil Chauhan emphasized the need for developing equipment for space and cyber warfare, calling for a strategic selection of weapons and updated R&D to meet modern demands. He highlighted the importance of expanding the defence manufacturing base and leveraging artificial intelligence to achieve self-reliance in defence.
content: In a recent address at the East Tech symposium in Ranchi, Chief of Defence Staff General Anil Chauhan underscored the importance of policy initiatives aimed at developing equipment for space and cyber warfare. He emphasized the need for strategic wea... [762 chars]

title: High-level exits at Elon Musk led xAI tied to management clashes and money concerns
description: Elon Musk has issued a 48-hour deadline to xAI employees for progress reports as the company faces staff reductions, senior departures, and escalating demands for productivity. The move comes at a time of ongoing internal upheaval and increased competition in the artificial intelligence sector.
content: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup, xAI, is undergoing another turbulent phase, marked by senior departures, layoffs, and mounting questions about governance. A recent email directive from Musk has also tightened accountability across the co... [2576 chars]

title: Massive Hiring Spree: South Korean Giants to Create 60,000 Jobs by 2029
description: Samsung and other major South Korean conglomerates will hire 60,000 employees by 2029 to address youth unemployment and boost the economy. The initiative aligns with governmental efforts to create jobs for young people, focusing on high-demand sectors such as semiconductors, biotechnology, and artificial intelligence.
content: South Korea's corporate landscape is set for a seismic shift as Samsung Group, alongside other major conglomerates, plans a massive hiring spree. The initiative aims to mitigate the nation's severe youth unemployment crisis and stimulate economic gro... [818 chars]
